channel.title: ansible on Vegetable Programing
channel.description: Recent content in ansible on Vegetable Programing

item.title: ansibleで"yum lockfile is held by another process"が発生
item.description: 事象 yum lockfile is held by another process でfailedする。 解決 lock_timeout を追加 - name: Install stuff yum: name: - git - python36 lock_timeout: 180 [Ansible] “yum lockfile is held by another process “エラーの対処法｜スクショはつらいよ バージョ
